about.about: I am Piyush Tiwari, a Software Development Engineer at Bajaj Finserv Health Limited, based in Pune. With a B.Tech in Electronics & Communications Engineering from the University Institute of Technology, RGPV, I bring a solid foundation in engineering principles and a passion for technology. I have a proven track record of developing and optimizing backend systems using Java, Spring Boot, NestJS, and TypeScript, significantly enhancing system performance and reliability. My expertise extends to microservices, event-driven architecture, and scalable solutions with a strong focus on security and user experience. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with Kubernetes, Docker, and various databases including MongoDB and PostgreSQL. I enjoy solving complex programming problems and have excelled in numerous competitive programming contests. When I'm not coding, I love working on personal projects that challenge my skills and creativity.
